name: Cleopatra
description:
Cleopatra is a strategy game developed by Impressions Games and BreakAway Games. It was originally released in 2000. It was published by Sierra On-Line. Cleopatra has a Metascore of 77, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Cleopatra is available on PC.
It was scored by Keith Zizza.
